text.description: Define a text that you'll like to see annotated.

minLinkFrequency.description: The minimum number of times the phrase should appear in the link in order for use to use it as a candidate for the annotation.

minLinkRelFrequency.description: Consider the candidate only if the given text points to the candidate with probability above this value. Value between 0 and 1.

nWordsToIgnoreFromList.description: Use this setting to ignore common phrases. If a phrase consists entirely of very frequent words, it will be ignore. A word is considered frequent if it is one of the most frequent words (in terms of document frequency) in the Wikipedia of the corresponding language. If 0 it will disable this heuristic.

minPMentionGivenPhrase.description: 'Probability that the given phrase, if found on Wikipedia, is annotated with the concept. If non-zero, it can help to remove the common words.'

pageRankSqThreshold.description: 'Probability that the given phrase, if found on Wikipedia, is annotated with the concept. If non-zero, it can help to remove the common words.'
